verses.verse: Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> Keep <WH8104> you judgment, <WH4941> and do <WH6213> justice: <WH6666> for my salvation <WH3444> is near <WH7138> to come, <WH935> and my righteousness <WH6666> to be revealed. <WH1540>

Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH582> that does <WH6213> this, <WH2063> and the son <WH1121> of man <WH120> that lays hold <WH2388> on it; that keeps <WH8104> the sabbath <WH7676> from polluting <WH2490> it, and keeps <WH8104> his hand <WH3027> from doing <WH6213> any <WH3605> evil. <WH7451>

Neither <WH408> let the son <WH1121> of the stranger, <WH5236> that has joined <WH3867> himself to the LORD, <WH3068> speak, <WH559> saying, <WH559> The LORD <WH3068> has utterly separated <WH914> me from his people: <WH5971> neither <WH408> let the eunuch <WH5631> say, <WH559> Behold, <WH2005> I am a dry <WH3002> tree. <WH6086>

For thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> to the eunuchs <WH5631> that keep <WH8104> my sabbaths, <WH7676> and choose <WH977> the things that please <WH2654> me, and take <WH2388> hold <WH2388> of my covenant; <WH1285>

Even to them will I give <WH5414> in my house <WH1004> and within my walls <WH2346> a place <WH3027> and a name <WH8034> better <WH2896> than of sons <WH1121> and of daughters: <WH1323> I will give <WH5414> them an everlasting <WH5769> name, <WH8034> that shall not be cut <WH3772> off.

Also the sons <WH1121> of the stranger, <WH5236> that join <WH3867> themselves to the LORD, <WH3068> to serve <WH8334> him, and to love <WH157> the name <WH8034> of the LORD, <WH3068> to be his servants, <WH5650> every <WH3605> one that keeps <WH8104> the sabbath <WH7676> from polluting <WH2490> it, and takes <WH2388> hold <WH2388> of my covenant; <WH1285>

Even them will I bring <WH935> to my holy <WH6944> mountain, <WH2022> and make them joyful <WH8055> in my house <WH1004> of prayer: <WH8605> their burnt <WH5930> offerings and their sacrifices <WH2077> shall be accepted <WH7522> on my altar; <WH4196> for my house <WH1004> shall be called <WH7121> an house <WH1004> of prayer <WH8605> for all <WH3605> people. <WH5971>

The Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> which gathers <WH6908> the outcasts <WH1760> of Israel <WH3478> said, <WH5002> Yet <WH5750> will I gather <WH6908> others to him, beside those that are gathered <WH6908> to him.
All <WH3605> you beasts <WH2416> of the field, <WH7704> come <WH857> to devour, <WH398> yes, all <WH3605> you beasts <WH2416> in the forest. <WH3293>

His watchmen <WH6822> are blind: <WH5787> they are all <WH3605> ignorant, <WH3808> <WH3045> they are all <WH3605> dumb <WH483> dogs, <WH3611> they cannot <WH3808> <WH3201> bark; <WH5024> sleeping, <WH1957> lying <WH7901> down, <WH7901> loving <WH157> to slumber. <WH5123>

Yes, they are greedy <WH5794> <WH5315> dogs <WH3611> which can <WH3045> never <WH3808> have <WH3045> enough, <WH7654> and they are shepherds <WH7462> that cannot <WH3808> <WH3045> understand: <WH995> they all <WH3605> look <WH6437> to their own way, <WH1870> every <WH376> one <WH376> for his gain, <WH1214> from his quarter. <WH7098>

Come <WH857> you, say they, I will fetch <WH3947> wine, <WH3196> and we will fill <WH5433> ourselves with strong drink; <WH7941> and to morrow <WH4279> shall be as this <WH2088> day, <WH3117> and much <WH3966> more <WH3499> abundant. <WH1419>
